about.text: I'm passionate about front-end technologies, I have knowledge in the area of ​​web design, web development and agile methodologies. I am currently working as a Web Developer at Créalo Digital, where I have had the opportunity to work in monolithic applications applying technologies such as Codeigniter and Angular under a REST architecture, always oriented to good practices and clean and maintainable code.

experience.title: Web Developer Junior
experience.text-one: I worked in the construction of a monetary credit management system using REST architecture with PHP and consuming each service from a front-end developed in Angular.
experience.text-two: I developed a mobile application to consult monetary credits with the Nativescript framework, implementing the communication to a REST API.
experience.text-three: I designed static web pages using HTML5, CSS and Bootstrap 4 framework.

education.degree: Technology in Analysis and Development of Information Systems

interests.text-one: I dedicate my time to research on new technologies that appear continuously, especially in the front-end area and can contribute to my professional and personal growth.
interests.text-two: I also enjoy reading mystery and fantasy novels, as well as creating DIY projects for carpentry and construction.
